articles.title: Probe Into Jared Kushner's Saudi Ties 'On the Table,' Republican Says
articles.description: The Trump administration's ties to Saudi Arabia are facing new scrutiny after a report saying Jared Kushner received $2 billion in Saudi funds.
articles.content:
Representative James Comer, the Republican who chairs the House Oversight Committee, said an investigation into Jared Kushner's ties to Saudi Arabia is "on the table."

articles.description: Rep. Mike Turner called them each out by name.
articles.content: Since the revelations that all three of them have possessed classified documents, members of Congress have expressed outrage at the apparent mishandling, though much of it has fallen along defensive partisan lines. There’s also been a certain befuddl... [1107 chars]

articles.author: The Hill
articles.title: Haley makes risky bet as she prepares to take on Trump
articles.description: Nikki Haley is poised to take a leap into the unknown next week when she becomes the first Republican to challenge former President Trump for the GOP’s 2024 nod. It’s a role that few other Republicans are eager to fill, given Trump’s penchant for trying to humiliate any of his political opponents, real or perceived.…
articles.content:

articles.title: Sean Hannity Blasts 'Gutless' Joe Biden for Doing Exactly What Trump Did
articles.description: A pre-game interview with the president is traditionally aired by the network that is airing the Super Bowl each year.
articles.content:
Fox News host Sean Hannity lambasted a recent decision from President Joe Biden as "gutless," despite Donald Trump having once made the same decision.

articles.title: Washington Post: Trump campaign commissioned research that failed to prove 2020 election fraud claims
articles.description: A research firm commissioned by former President Donald Trump's 2020 campaign team to prove his electoral fraud claims instead failed to substantiate his theories, the Washington Post reported Saturday.
articles.content:
